title: Silca Synergetic Race Grease
content:
Silca has spent considerable time and energy developing lubricants and wax solutions to extend the life of bicycle components. Today, the Indiana-based company announced the launch of a new advanced formula, Synergetic Race Grease ($25),designed to elevate the performance and longevity of modern bicycle components…

Building on the success of their award-winning Synergetic Chain Lubricant, Synergetic Race Grease combines the low friction properties of oil-based lubricants with the pressure capabilities and wear resistance of thicker assembly greases.

This pro-level grease is engineered utilizing the same Type-V ultra-synthetic oil base used in Synergetic Chain Lube, thickened into a grease using the synthetic wax technology from SpeedChip, paired with the low-friction WS2 additive package used in both. The resulting low viscosity grease offers higher longevity and performance for bearings, bushings, suspension pivots, threaded assemblies, and press-fit interfaces.

Key benefits of Synergetic Race Grease include:

  • Up to 50% Reduction in Friction: Improves mechanical efficiency in bearings and bushings.
  • Up to 90% Reduction in Wear: Extends the operational life of precision components.
  • Extreme Load Stability: Resists displacement under heavy use, reducing maintenance intervals.
  • Friction Characteristics: Optimized for both sliding and rotational surfaces.
  • Torque Control: Enables consistent clamping forces without over-tightening when used as assembly grease.
  • Formulation Purity: Free of unnecessary dyes or additives that could compromise interface integrity.
  • Made in the USA.

See more at Silca.
